update.description:
A UI plugin to log in the server [RestUiPlugin]
A server plugin to send messages to the web server [RestWebPlugin]
A a test world [rest_web.world].

A test web server with testing instruction can be found in:
	test/plugins/rest-web/readme.txt

The largest file is RestApi.cc, which is mostly the libcurl code (adapted from their C examples)

content.raw: This method seems to be adding a new `Post` to a vector. `SendUnpostedPosts()` looks like the consumer for each `Post`. Do you plan to use these methods with multiple threads or callbacks? If so, I'd suggest to use a mutex in this class and make it thread safe.
content.html: This method seems to be adding a new Post to a vector. SendUnpostedPosts() looks like the consumer for each Post. Do you plan to use these methods with multiple threads or callbacks? If so, I'd suggest to use a mutex in this class and make it thread safe.

content.raw:
`Request()` might trigger an exception. Not sure if you want to catch it here.

Also, do you need to check the response to see if the response shows a login success?
content.html:
Request() might trigger an exception. Not sure if you want to catch it here.

Also, do you need to check the response to see if the response shows a login success?
